text: Thomas Barber (fl. 1395), born in Ireland and then settled in Leominster, Herefordshire, was an English politician. He was a Member (MP) of the Parliament of England for Leominster in 1395. ==References== Category:14th- century births Category:Year of death missing Category:English MPs 1395 Category:14th-century Irish people Category:People from Herefordshire
title: Thomas Barber (fl. 1395)
